author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: جميع أحزاب مختلفه أرض منتظر و چون آفتاب حقيقت از أفق عالم طالع کلّ معرض إلّا من شاء اللّه اگر اليوم مقامات نفوس موقنه ذکر شود بيم آنست از فرط سرور بعضی هلاک شوند نقطه بيان ميفرمايد:
translation: Behold, how the divers peoples and kindreds of the earth have been waiting for the coming of the Promised One. No sooner had He, Who is the Sun of Truth, been made manifest, than, lo, all turned away from Him, except them whom God was pleased to guide. We dare not, in this Day, lift the veil that concealeth the exalted station which every true believer can attain, for the joy which such a revelation must provoke might well cause a few to faint away and die.
